issue.title: [CF 935] Lua error after latest update
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

Started after updating to the most recent (6.2.6-310-g0bcbfba) today. It appears when I log on any character, but the addon still works fine and does not seem to display the error after dismissing it initially so nothing critical.  Thanks
